code:
$ apt update 
$ apt upgrade  
$ apt install python  
$ pip install wordlist
use: $ wordlist -h [to see all options]  $ wordlist -m 4 -M 6 -o wordlist.txt 12345678  -m = minimum length,  -M = maximum length,  wordlist.txt is output file,  12345678 = here you can provide your own alphabets.   Now open this file type this command : $ cat wordlist.txt
name: Wordlist Generator
